programmes.show_description: Action thriller with Nicolas Cage. A police officer takes matters into his own hands and assembles a group of strangers to help a single mother get vengeance on the men who raped her.
Crime drama based on true events. A ragtag group of ageing East End criminals plot an audacious, multi-million-pound raid on an underground facility in London.

A restaurant server claims she was 'football tackled' by her roommate because she was ignoring her during an argument.
When a woman allegedly spins her car and sprays rocks at her estranged lover, he is accused of firing back with a handful of rocks.
An experiment in living together fails miserably when a pregnant young woman sues her ex-boyfriend for $4,000 in moving costs.
A man is short on money to pay rent and a security deposit, so he offers up the use of his car; his roommate says that never happened.
Shards of glass from a broken window lead a haemophiliac to fear for his life and file a restraining order against a fellow tenant.
A flatbed driver accuses his boss of stealing over $2,000 from his paycheck to cover repairs after he has an accident.
A woman cites friends and neighbours as witnesses to her ex-coworker's alleged violence, but none of them show up in court.
A mother of three fails to report income and loses her Section 8 status prompting her landlord to kick her out; her 'guarantor' father refuses to pay up as promised.
A woman demands that her estranged stepdad pay for a loan to catch up on mortgage payments; he claims the loan was between her and her mother.

New Leaf: This series invites audiences into the intriguing realm of crime-solving with Steve Keogh, a detective with 30 years of experience, 12 of those as a top-tier murder detective.
Steve Keogh discusses the murder of Jodie Chesney, a 17-year old girl stabbed in a park. The police, a CCTV expert, and court reporter share how the case was solved.
This episode looks at the intriguing case of Kouri Richins, a children's book author who finds herself at the centre of a murder investigation following the death of her husband.
When a state trooper is attacked, investigators uncover a 'signature' that links the assault to the murder of a young woman.
Cats, Flies and Snapshots: Analysing the evidence, the medical detectives solve real crimes using forensic techniques, alongside reconstructions (which may be unsuitable for younger viewers).

Chuck Norris is Walker in this modern, high-kicking martial arts western. Alex is among those held hostage when a group of escaped prisoners take shelter in a church.
Mountain adventure starring Chris O'Donnell. A climber must rescue his sister from certain death when she becomes stranded just a few hundred feet from the summit of K2.
Thriller with Antonio Banderas. An ageing mob hitman turns against his boss and sacrifices everything to rescue a young runaway from the very organisation he has dedicated his life to building.
Action adventure with Steven Seagal. Two special forces agents transporting a pair of female convicts to prison come under attack by a mercenary force sent to kill them.
Action thriller with Tyrese Gibson. An ex-Marine suffering from PTSD is forced to confront his fears when he and a group of innocent customers are taken hostage at a retail outlet.

A woman claims she caught her boyfriend at a hotel with another woman and submits video evidence of him allegedly trying to break into her house.
A woman files for a restraining order against her boyfriend after he allegedly throws a boot at her and bruises her.
A woman sues her deceased grandson's former fianc√©e for the cost of a headstone after a $10,000 life insurance pay-out.
A defendant is ill-prepared for questions from the Judge when she is sued by her ex-roommate for a security deposit.
A pregnant woman accuses her brother of stranding her in Maryland while she was working for his trucking business; both want to stop the drama.
A midwife makes the hard call to stay with a client whose baby just died instead of attending to a woman just beginning a difficult labour.
A woman's jealous rage leads to a computer allegedly being thrown across the room and a cellphone being crushed.
A couple move in with mum to improve credit scores and save for a new home; unfortunately, a fight over money and tools divide them.
A man denies destroying property and sues his ex-landlord for throwing everything he owned out on the street.

Vanishing Man: This series invites audiences into the intriguing realm of crime-solving with Steve Keogh, a detective with 30 years of experience, 12 of those as a top-tier murder detective.
Detective Keogh and SIO Terry Crompton discuss the 2016 murder of Yang Liu, whose torso was found in a suitcase.
In a case that captured worldwide attention, the Menendez brothers were tried and convicted of murdering their parents, Jose and Kitty Menendez.
A mother and daughter vanish whilst out shopping. When the girl turns up dead, the mother is the initial suspect. But who really killed her?
The Cheater: Analysing the evidence, the medical detectives solve real crimes using forensic techniques, alongside reconstructions (which may be unsuitable for younger viewers).

Chuck Norris fights crime and helps the community as the eponymous Walker. When offered a job as a security chief at a resort, CD ends up investigating his predecessor's death.
Sci-fi thriller with Logan Marshall-Green. A mugging victim left confined to a wheelchair seeks revenge with an experimental computer chip implant - until it starts taking over his body.
Action thriller sequel with Danny Trejo. The relentless Mexican mercenary is hired by the American president to stop a billionaire arms dealer's plot to start a nuclear war.
